author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ameris Bancorp Announces Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.73
text:
April 20 (Reuters) - Ameris Bancorp:
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.70 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.73 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE $95.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $98.1 MILLION
* NET INTEREST INCOME ON A TAX-EQUIVALENT BASIS FOR Q1 OF 2018 TOTALED $69.8 MILLION, COMPARED WITH $62.1 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
